availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Huston Harrison Miller (Calloway County, KY, farmer, soldier, and prov govt)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Miller and Elizabeth Miller. Resident in Calloway County in 1850. Farmer in Calloway County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) as a private from December 9, 1862 to May 21, 1865.
